tooltip.cupsaddons.fuel_item_instruction: §8§oRight click with the required fuel in your off-hand to fuel this item.
tooltip.cupsaddons.use_item_mainhand_ins: §eRight click with this item in your main-hand to use it.
tooltip.cupsaddons.use_item_offhand_inst: §eRight click with this item in your off-hand to use it.
tooltip.cupsaddons.crysophilists_pickaxe:

§fThis tool is Unbreakable§7.
